metadata.job_to_be_done: Evaluate workflow automation opportunities using document processing tools.

extracted_sections.section_title: Customizing signature workflows using seed values

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
- Enhanced productivity : Work across multiple PDFs and documents in various formats, 
including Teams and Zoom meeting transcripts, streamlining your workflow and 
saving time for higher -priority tasks. - Improved comprehension:  You can better understand complex PDF documents 
because the features provide insights and more contex t around the content. Benefits of generative AI features  
The generative AI features in Acrobat and Acrobat Reader significantly improve 
comprehension, help you get insights, and produce high -quality content quickly. Chrome or  Microsoft Edge.

Customizing signature workflows using seed values  
Seed  values  offer additional control to document authors by letting them specify which 
choices signers can make when signing a document. For information on the available signing preferences, see “ Signing  Workflow  
Preferences ” in the  Digital  Signature Guide. For more 
information about customizing signatures using seed values, see the  Digital Signature  Guide. ) 
 
Set signing preferences 
Signing workflow preferences control what you can see and do when the signing dialog box 
opens. • Choose a signature type.
